Component.label: Map
Component.Description:
The Map operation opens the native device application and calculates a path between starting point and ending point specifying the addresses.

This component uses:

  • the googlemaps PhoneGap plugin to interact with the device (https://github.com/webratio/phonegap-googlemaps-plugin)
  • the google-playservices libraries for the Android device to use the map (https://github.com/webratio/google-play-services)
  • the http-request PhoneGap plugin for the Android device to use the map
  • the googlemaps-ios-sdk PhoneGap plugin for the iOS device to use the map (https://github.com/webratio/googlemaps-ios-sdk-for-phonegap)
Component.InputDescription: The source address to use as start point to calculate the path.
The destination address to use as end point to calculate the path.
